member.name: T:Cartomatic.Utils.JsonSerializableObjects.SerializableList`1
member.summary:
EF does not allow saving lits of primitive types even though dbs such as PostgreSQL do allow it. Therefore need a wrapper object that is used to store json serialised arrays. Note: if array based ops on the db side are required, this will not be a good type to use.
Also, one need to make the type non-generic in order to use it with EF mapping, so MyType : SerializableList of T
